faqs.question: How can I view my contract details on LiquidmindAI?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the Contracts module in your dashboard. You will see the contract value, billing cycle, renewal date, and MRR in USD.

faqs.question: What does MRR mean in my billing breakdown?
faqs.answer: MRR (Monthly Recurring Revenue) represents the normalized monthly revenue from your active contracts. It is automatically calculated from your billing cycle.

faqs.question: How do I check my current billing cycle?
faqs.answer: Go to Billing → Billing Cycle. The system will display whether your subscription is monthly, quarterly, or annual.

faqs.question: Where can I see the status of my payments?
faqs.answer: The Billing Status tab shows whether your invoices are Paid, Pending, or Overdue. You will also receive automated alerts for overdue invoices.

faqs.question: How do I raise a support ticket when I experience downtime?
faqs.answer: In the Complaints & Support module, click 'Raise Ticket,' provide a description of the downtime, and attach any technical logs. A ticket ID will be generated for tracking.

faqs.question: Can I view the history of tickets I have raised?
faqs.answer: Yes, under Ticket History, you can view all previously raised tickets, their timestamps, root cause analysis, and resolution notes from our engineers.

faqs.question: What kind of downtime alerts will I receive?
faqs.answer: You will receive real-time alerts for planned maintenance, unplanned outages, or service degradation via email and SMS notifications.

faqs.question: How can I be notified about contract expiry?
faqs.answer: Contract alerts are automatically sent 30, 14, and 7 days before expiry. You can also enable push notifications in your settings.

faqs.question: What products or services does LiquidmindAI provide?
faqs.answer: We provide connectivity solutions such as Dedicated Internet, Last Mile Access, MPLS services, and managed cloud solutions. Your subscribed products are listed under 'My Products.'

faqs.question: Can I download my invoices and contract reports?
faqs.answer: Yes, invoices and contract summaries can be exported in PDF or Excel format from the Billing & Contracts module.

faqs.question: How do I escalate an unresolved complaint?
faqs.answer: If a ticket remains unresolved beyond the SLA, you can escalate it directly from the Ticket History page. The system will notify a senior engineer for priority handling.

faqs.question: Can the dashboard predict possible downtimes?
faqs.answer: Yes, predictive analytics is applied on past complaint data and network performance metrics to forecast potential service disruptions.
